Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: Hymn to the Virgin Mary by William of Shoreham — fourteen 6-line stanzas (aaabab)

BLAdd17376.First Lines:
Marye mayde mylde and freChambre of þe
                    trynyte…
BLAdd17376.Last Lines:
…And þaȝ ich habbe ysd þe wrangeÞou
                    graunte me amendynge
